text: Poritia phormedon is an Indomalayan butterfly endemic to Borneo that belongs to the lycaenids, the blues family.Seki, Y.; Takanami, Y. & Otsuka, K. (1991). Butterflies of Borneo. 2 (1) Lycaenidae. Tobishima Corporation, Tokyo. Poritia phormedon was described by Hamilton Herbert Druce in 1895. ==References== Category:Butterflies described in 1895 Category:Poritia
title: Poritia phormedon
